## Overview

This project is about understanding the factors that impact student performance. I analyzed data on study hours, past scores, extracurricular activities, and sleep patterns to see how they affect to academic success.

## Methodology

Used multiple linear regression to develop a predictive model that highlights the key variables affecting academic performance.
